short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add links to Slinkky with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slinkky helps busy teams stay connected.

Get organized
Stop scouring through email and Slack to find what you need. Keep all your team's important links and resources in one place.

Easy access
Don't leave anyone in the dark, let the whole team access the info they need from any device.

Keep your clients happy
Eliminate confusion over file versions and location, make it simple for your clients to find what they need.
